query:
SELECT gl.id, gl.gestor_id, gl.loja_id, g.nome as gestor_nome, l.nome as loja_nome 
FROM gestor_lojas gl 
JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestor_id = g.id 
JOIN lojas l ON gl.loja_id = l.id 
ORDER BY l.nome 
LIMIT 50;
